summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Electron desktop app implementation for StealthInterview. All desktop app features are working correctly including download section, platform-specific cards, and file structure.
passed_tests: Landing page Desktop Download section displays correctly
Windows download card shows with correct .exe button and testid
macOS download card shows with correct .dmg button and testid
Desktop features section displays System Tray, Global Shortcuts, Auto Updates, Native Stealth
Build from source GitHub link is present and functional
Download buttons are clickable and properly enabled
Version information (v1.2.0) displayed for both platforms
File sizes shown correctly (85 MB Windows, 92 MB Mac)
Electron main.js file exists with proper window management, stealth overlay, system tray, global shortcuts
package.json has correct build scripts for Windows and Mac using electron-builder
Build script (build.sh) available for cross-platform builds
